recipes.name: ActionBar
recipes.composition: Use FilterBar (L5) directly — it has search, quickActions, filters, and viewSelector slot props. Do NOT compose manually from Inline+SearchInput.

recipes.name: DetailHeader
recipes.composition: Stack(gap=100) > Badge (status), Heading level=1, Text variant="secondary" (metadata), Inline > action Buttons

recipes.name: FormSection
recipes.composition: Card > Card.Header (section title as Heading level=2) + Card.Body > Stack(gap=200) > form fields (Input, Select, Switch). Save/Cancel buttons in Inline at bottom.

recipes.name: StatCard
recipes.composition: Card > Card.Body > Stack(gap=100) > Text size="sm" variant="secondary" (label), Heading level={2} (value). Optional: Badge or trend indicator.

recipes.name: EmptyState
recipes.composition: Stack(align=center, gap=200) > Icon (large, 48px), Heading level={3} (title), Text variant="secondary" (description), Button (primary action)

recipes.name: ModalDialogFooter
recipes.composition: Modal(open, onClose, title, footer={<Inline justify="flex-end" gap=100> <Button kind="secondary">Cancel</Button> <Button kind="brand">Confirm</Button> </Inline>}) > content as children

recipes.name: TabNavigation
recipes.composition: Tabs(items=[{ id, label, content: <ReactNode> }]) — content is rendered inline. For controlled mode add activeTab + onChange.

recipes.name: DataTableWithActions
recipes.composition: AgreementTableView > filterBar={<FilterBar search={...} />} + <DataTable columns={...} data={...} renderRowActions={(row) => <Inline>action Buttons</Inline>} />

recipes.name: BreadcrumbPageTitle
recipes.composition: Stack(gap=100) > Breadcrumb(items=[{ label, href }]) + Heading level={1} (page title) + optional Text variant="secondary" (subtitle)

recipes.name: FormWithValidation
recipes.composition: Stack(gap=200) > optional Banner(kind="error") for form-level errors + Input/Select with error prop (string) for field-level validation. Submit Button at bottom.

recipes.name: CardGridLayout
recipes.composition: Grid(columns=2 or 3, gap=300) > Card > Card.Body > Stack(gap=100) > content. Use for stat cards, feature cards, or any repeated card layout.
